price: 69. Est-ce vous qui la faites descendre des nuages ou est-ce Nous qui le faisons ?
arabic: ءَأَنتُمۡ أَنزَلۡتُمُوهُ مِنَ ٱلۡمُزۡنِ أَمۡ نَحۡنُ ٱلۡمُنزِلُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: a-antum anzaltumūhu mina al-muz'ni am naḥnu al-munzilūna
